name: Don't Stop (itch) (Jack Robotham)
description:
Warning: This is a very difficult game.

This was made for the Mini Jam 99, with the theme of "Birds" (which I completely ignored) and the limitation "Can't stop moving," which I used- the player cannot slow down or stop, and will run into saws/spikes/axes again, and again, and again...

The player will constantly follow the mouse. Avoid obstacles and reach the green area to win!

There are 3 boss levels- in each, you must survive all of the obstacles before the door will open.
